attributes.action: Allow Barbers and Hairdressers to get vaccinated as soon as possible.
attributes.additional_details: On a busy day (which we will have a lot of once we open again), we will be in close contact with over 25-35 different households on a daily basis. To stop the spread of COVID19, it is very important for us to be vaccinated for the health and safety of our clients and loved ones and also our hair professionals.
attributes.background: With Barbershops and Hairdressers opening on the 12th April, I believe that it is vital that they are allowed to get vaccinated as soon as possible. We will be in close contact with the public and should be allowed access to the vaccination.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Allow priority vaccination for those working in close contact services
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572808
